name: Scum And Villainy
Lore: 'A relief in Nal Hutta sandstone. Hand-carved by slaves of the great Hutt artist Dreyba. Commissioned by Jabba to illustrate his vast influence. Titled ''Ne Ganna Dateel Jabba.''',
Text: 'Deploy on Audience Chamber. While all your ability on table is provided by aliens and independent starship pilots, your aliens and starships deploy -1 and you retrieve 2 Force whenever you initiate battle. (Immune to Alter if you control at least three Jabba''s Palace sites.)',
